verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Unto thee do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, O thou that <S%H3427>sittest<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.

Behold <S%H5869><s%>, as the eyes of <S%H5650>servants<s%> look unto the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H113>master<s%>, As the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of a <S%H8198>maid<s%> unto the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H1404>mistress<s%>; So our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> look unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, Until he have mercy upon <S%H2603>us<s%>.
Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>us<s%>, O Jehovah, have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H7227>us<s%>; For we are exceedingly <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H937>contempt<s%>.

Our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7227>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%> With the <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> of those that are at <S%H7600>ease<s%>, And with the <S%H937>contempt<s%> of the <S%H1343>proud<s%>.
